import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../styles/login.css' export default function AuthForm(props) { const { authUser, signup } = props const [state, setState] = useState({ username: "", password: "" }) const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const authType = signup ? "signup" : "login" authUser(authType, state) .then(console.log("dunn")) } console.log(state) const handleChange = (e) => { setState({ ...state, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}) } return (
{signup &&
}
) }
